summary: After inheriting his father's title, the young noble Hugh O'Connell is taken hostage by the English viceroy but escapes to lead an uprising.
cast: Peter McEnery|Susan Hampshire|Tom Adams|Gordon Jackson|Norman Wooland|Richard Leech|Peter Jeffrey|Marie Kean|Bill Owen|Peggy Marshall|Maurice Roëves|Donal McCann|Fidelma Murphy|John Forbes-Robertson|Patrick Holt|Robert Cawdron|Maire O'Neill|Máire Ní Ghráinne|Roger Croucher|Keith McConnell|Inigo Jackson|Peter Cranwell|Andrew Keir|Peter Brooks|Dido Plumb
title: El príncipe de Donegal
